scripts.pdf: npm run build && (npm run preview > /dev/null & sleep 4); lsof -ti:4321 > preview.pid; npx starlight-to-pdf http://localhost:4321 -p ./public/_pdf --filename spectrum-docs --margins '0 0 0 0' --paddings '2cm 1cm 2cm 1.5cm' --header ./src/assets/pdf-header.html --footer ./src/assets/pdf-footer.html --exclude /demo --no-starlight-print-css --print-bg --pdf-outline; kill $(cat preview.pid) && rm preview.pid && echo 'PDF script finished'
